title: Trump takes aim at officials who police agency wrongdoing, protect workers
summary: Trump fired top officials overseeing ethics, whistleblower protections, and labor rights, including the heads of the Office of Government Ethics, Office of Special Counsel, and the Merit Systems Protection Board
